beer.beer_description:
A full-bodied yet deceptively easy-drinking strong ale with great flavour and length.
This beer is brewed with a complex malt character that includes delicious biscuity and toffee notes derived from UK-grown Maris Otter and enhanced through the use of Crystal and Chocolate malts supplied from the highly renowned Simpson’s maltings in Berwick-upon-Tweed. In addition, a generous charge of Simpson’s unique Golden Naked Oats adds a subtle nuttiness to the mid-palate.
Although designed to really show off the very best that British malts have to offer, the beer is well-balanced through the judicious use of English Challenger hops in the main boil and a dual late-addition of Goldings and Fuggles. The resulting bitterness is soft and juicy.
Rapid top-fermentation at a relatively high temperature leads to the development of soft-fruit flavours that, along with a slight tartness, help to complement the full-bodied sweet malt character.
At 5.6% alcohol by volume, Mallee Bull is naturally the strongest beer in our range, so take the bull by the horns and watch out, it can kick!

items.checkin_comment: Had this bottled before and it was a fine English bitter. On draft at source today maybe not at its best. A touch sharpChestnut brown. Slightly cloudy. Fair bit of malt

items.badge_description:
Ready, set, gold! Are you ready for a Podium Party?!?

At Untappd, we love checking in beers (some say for sport), and this year, there's an easy way to earn your spot on the podium.
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 130 distinct venues!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 400 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 81!

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 50 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 11!

beer.beer_description:
A full-bodied yet deceptively easy-drinking strong ale with great flavour and length.
This beer is brewed with a complex malt character that includes delicious biscuity and toffee notes derived from UK-grown Maris Otter and enhanced through the use of Crystal and Chocolate malts supplied from the highly renowned Simpson’s maltings in Berwick-upon-Tweed. In addition, a generous charge of Simpson’s unique Golden Naked Oats adds a subtle nuttiness to the mid-palate.
Although designed to really show off the very best that British malts have to offer, the beer is well-balanced through the judicious use of English Challenger hops in the main boil and a dual late-addition of Goldings and Fuggles. The resulting bitterness is soft and juicy.
Rapid top-fermentation at a relatively high temperature leads to the development of soft-fruit flavours that, along with a slight tartness, help to complement the full-bodied sweet malt character.
At 5.6% alcohol by volume, Mallee Bull is naturally the strongest beer in our range, so take the bull by the horns and watch out, it can kick!

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 60 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 13!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 40 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 9!

items.badge_description: At a new place and don't want to choose a pint of something you may not like? Grab a few tasters! Enjoy some small pours and then decide which to upgrade to a full pour. That's 110 checkins with the serving style of Taster. Try 5 more for Level 23! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

items.checkin_comment: Beer is good 4 stars. No one wearing masks in the bar, walking around everywhere. Not even the servers.

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 5 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 2!

items.checkin_comment: A solid English Bitter. All the right flavours going on here.
